Package server

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHandler, TCPHandler, UDPHandler
    public interface Server

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void closeConnections()
      Closes the sockets, data input and output streams opened.
      void createServer​(int port)
      Initiates connection of the client.
      java.net.InetAddress getClientAddress()
      Fetches the IP address of the client which sent the request.
      int getClientPort()
      Fetches port number of client from which request came in.
      java.lang.String performOperation​(java.lang.String request)
      Performs operations required by the key-value store like PUT, GET, DELETE.
      java.lang.String receiveRequest()
      Receives the request from client and prints it on the console.
      void sendReply​(java.lang.String reply)
      Sends response to the client after operation has been performed on the received request.

    • Method Detail

      • createServer

        void createServer​(int port)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Initiates connection of the client.
        Parameters:
        port - to listen to client's requests on
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when either host is down or port is unavavilable/wrong

      • receiveRequest

        java.lang.String receiveRequest()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Receives the request from client and prints it on the console.
        Returns:
        client request if valid otherwise, logs and returns malformed packet message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when unable to receive request from client

      • performOperation

        java.lang.String performOperation​(java.lang.String request)
        Performs operations required by the key-value store like PUT, GET, DELETE.
        Parameters:
        request - string received from the client
        Returns:
        response after performing desired operation

      • sendReply

        void sendReply​(java.lang.String reply)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Sends response to the client after operation has been performed on the received request.
        Parameters:
        reply - string to be sent to the client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when unable to send to the client

      • closeConnections

        void closeConnections()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the sockets, data input and output streams opened.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - unable to close the connections.

      • getClientAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getClientAddress()
        Fetches the IP address of the client which sent the request.
        Returns:
        IP address of client

      • getClientPort

        int getClientPort()
        Fetches port number of client from which request came in.
        Returns:
        port number of client
